item.title: Please help me with my client
item.dc:creator: @jakeomatic jakeomatic
item.description:
@jakeomatic wrote:

This is when I try to compile my client:

Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlink:deporecation for details. Press any key to continue. . .

When I try to run my client it says:

Exception in thread "main java.lang.NoClassDefFoundErro: EGUI Press any key to continue. . .

Please help me…

and heres the EGUI if it helps a bit

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“127.0.0.1”, “127.0.0.1”, “127.0.0.1”
});
}
}[/code]
